sections.title: Heritor Knight (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Heritor Knight class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Skill and Heart as One (Ex) (Heritor Knight)
sections.description: Heritor knight levels stack with fighter levels for weapon training and feat prerequisites.

sections.title: Savior of the Swallowed (Ex) (Heritor Knight)
sections.description: Make a longsword attack as a standard action against creatures restraining allies, automatically freeing them if the attack roll meets their CMD.

sections.title: Heritor’s Honor (Su) (Heritor Knight)
sections.description: Gains a bonus on Will saves equal to Charisma modifier.

sections.title: Witches’ Woe (Sp, Su) (Heritor Knight)
sections.description: Gains bonus to saves against hexes and curses, plus daily remove curse spell-like ability.

sections.title: Skyreaver (Su) (Heritor Knight)
sections.description: Make a longsword attack against flying creatures that forces them to land and penalizes Fly checks.

sections.title: Wraithwall (Su) (Heritor Knight)
sections.description: Inspire allies within 30 feet to gain ghost touch armor and bonuses against ability damage, drain, and negative levels.

sections.title: Mohrgbreaker (Su) (Heritor Knight)
sections.description: Make a longsword attack against undead that removes their special natural weapon and touch attacks on a failed Will save.

sections.title: Mighty Strike (Ex) (Heritor Knight)
sections.description: Gains Vital Strike and Improved Vital Strike as bonus feats and can apply Improved Vital Strike to standard action attacks.

sections.title: Reforged Heart (Su/Sp) (Heritor Knight)
sections.description: Can cast greater make whole once per day as a spell-like ability.

sections.title: Image of Divinity (Su) (Heritor Knight)
sections.description: Appearance changes to resemble the Inheritor and gains touch healing for good creatures or damage for evil creatures.

sections.title: Redeemer of Undeath (Su) (Heritor Knight)
sections.description: Make a longsword attack against good-aligned undead that can destroy and redeem them on a failed Will save.

sections.title: Freed by Blood (Su) (Heritor Knight)
sections.description: Take damage as an immediate action to grant an ally a sacred bonus on saves against death, paralysis, or compulsion effects.

sections.title: Sky Stride (Su) (Heritor Knight)
sections.description: Constantly under the effects of air walk with crimson cloth appearing beneath feet.

sections.title: Unveiling Mistress (Su) (Heritor Knight)
sections.description: Emit an aura that reveals the true form of all creatures within 30 feet for 1 minute.
